divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in the back den watching TV. We have a huge bay window and ahorizontal sliding glass window. OUt of the corner of my eye i caugh ta brightyellow flash. I looked out the window and the object shaped similiar to alightbulb zipped across the sky from S to W. I tried to run out on the backdeck to try and see it but by the time i got out there it was gone.
